param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module class suffix
param.description: A CSS class to be applied to the module container, this allows individual module styling

param.name: limit
param.label: # to display
param.description: The number of items to display.

param.name: charlimit
param.label: Length of Comment Preview
param.description: Number of characters to display in forum comment.

param.name: forum
param.label: Included Discussions From
param.description: Where the discussions are pulled from.
